mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_ROLE( name, code, sort, description, isEnable ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{code}, #{sort}, #{description}, #{isEnable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_ROLE a SET a.`name` = #{name}, a.`code` = #{code}, a.`sort` = #{sort}, a.`description` = #{description}, a.isEnable = #{isEnable} WHERE a.`id` = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM SYS_ROLE a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.isEnable = #{isEnable}
ORDER BY a.sort DESC
